name: Pysconian Deluxe
description:
PYSCONIAN Deluxe for POKITTO®

Pysconian is a mega addictive space shooter made for the Pokitto opensource game console (www.pokitto.com). The game is loosely based on the arcade classic Bosconian.

CONTROLS (POKITTO)

  • D-pad - turn player ship
  • Button A - Fire
  • Button B - Activate Powerup
  • Button C - Pause

Changing music tracks: press left & right while in PAUSE mode

CONTROLS (Windows emulator)

  • Cursor keys - turn player ship
  • Key A - Fire
  • Key S - Activate Powerup
  • Key C - Pause

IMPORTANT NOTE about Pokitto Windows emulator:

Windows emulator has limited sound support and no support for saving highscores.

You can only get the FULL EXPERIENCE on a real Pokitto device.

SCORING

INSTALLING AND PLAYING THE GAME

On Pokitto:

  • copy MUSIC directory in ZIP file to your SD game disk 
    the end result should be SD/MUSIC/Pysc1.raw ...
  • copy PYSCODX.POP to a directory on SD card
    (I recommend 2Arcade directory)
  • use Kraken loader to load PYSCODX.POP

 On Windows:

  • extract PyscoDX_Win_emu.zip
  • run PyscoDX.exe

BEFORE YOU DOWNLOAD

Pysconian was 7 months in the making. Although you can download the game for free, consider giving a small donation to support more high-quality releases on Pokitto.

THANK YOU! - Jonne

ARTWORK, SOUND EFFECTS, CODE

Will be released CC0 later

POKITTO® GAME CONSOLE      

Pysconian was made with microPython language to demonstrate that impressive games can be made even with Python programming language on Pokitto - a device that runs on a 72MHz ARM-Cortex-M0+ chip with only 36kB of RAM!
